original_text: Therefore, brothers, pick out from among you seven men of good repute, full of the Spirit and of wisdom, whom we will appoint to this duty.
korean_text: 형제들아 너희 가운데서 성령과 지혜가 충만하여 칭찬 받는 사람 일곱을 택하라 우리가 이 일을 그들에게 맡기고

sentences.original_text: pick out from among you seven men of good repute,
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 중에서 명성이 좋은 사람 일곱을 택하라,

sentences.original_text: full of the Spirit and of wisdom,
whom we will appoint to this duty.
